text: cheonsadeul-i malhagil los-iyeo u lineun geudae junim-eulobuteo on saja deul-ila geudeul-i gyeolko geudaeleul haechi ji moshalila geuleomeulo geudaeui ga joggwa hamkke eodum-eul tago tteonala geuligo neohui gaunde nugudo dwidol-a boji malla geudaeui anaeegeneun geu deul-ege iss-eossdeon jaeang-i iss-eulila achim-i god geudeul-eul beolhal sigan-ini achim-i god dagaogo issji anhneunyo
